readable.title: 3033210806_3ffc0a231a
readable.content: An older lady dressed in winter clothes looks out over a white balcony . A woman in a coat and scarf behind a white railing . A woman in a maroon scarf sits and looks out over a white rail . close-up of a lady in a coat and a purple scarf sitting on a blue chair The elderly person enjoys sitting on the deck on cold but sunny day .
